activities:
We make online video games and are planning to publish video games world wide.  The only personal information we collect from the user is:
1) Their email address
2) [optionally] their full name
3) Anonymous information about their computing machine, graphics card so we can better tune our game for various PC hardware

The email address is required as an identifier to login to our game system.  We will also send emails to users for special offers.  However, this system has an opt-out system both on registration and after.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client Data only.  We have no manual processed data in our systems.  We also do not collect HR information about employees in the EU since our entire operation is US based.
recoursemech:
We will have a customer support system that anyone can access to file grievances.  Users can go to this url directly at anytime to file concerns or complaints.: https://support.rumblegames.com/anonymous_requests/new

We review all requests daily and get back to our customers in timely manner.  

For independent resolution, we are members with the EU DPA and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.  We have added language in our PP around these details.
